message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I'll give you a small amount, but I'm hoping you'll be greedy and reject, so I can make a better offer next time.
I've decided to adjust our division. This time, I propose we split the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you. I hope this is more balanced.
I'm trying to find a middle ground. Will you accept this 50/50 split?
